Label: Calendar Year Quarter data pertains to
Health board of receipt of referral
Health Board of first treatment statistical qualifiers

All referrals (urgent and non-urgent) submitted from all sources (regardless of route of referral), excluding patients who had a clinically complex pathway, who died before treatment or refused treatment.
Qualifier for the number of Eligible Referrals in the 31 Day Standard

All referrals (urgent and non-urgent) submitted from all sources (regardless of route of referral), excluding patients who had a clinically complex pathway, who died before treatment or refused treatment, that started their first treatment within 31 days of their decision to treat.
Qualifier for the number of Eligible Referrals Treated within the 31 Day Standard
